project.name: Gentoo Sparc
project.description: The Gentoo Sparc project provides the Gentoo GNU/Linux operating system to the sparc and ultrasparc platforms.
project.longdescription: Gentoo/Sparc is a Gentoo project designed to bring the Gentoo GNU/Linux operating system to the sparc and ultrasparc platforms. Gentoo/Sparc aims to provide a usable server and desktop environment for your various Sparc related endeavours.

extraproject.name: Webpage
extraproject.p: The development and maintenance of the project web page to ensure that information and current status of Gentoo/SPARC on sparc architecture.

extraproject.name: Documentation
extraproject.p: The aim of the documentation team is to ensure that installation instructions are up to date and commensurate with our latest releases of the Gentoo/SPARC LiveCD.

extraproject.name: LiveCD
extraproject.p: Development and timely release of installation LiveCD to include new variants on current hardware and improved compatibility with known hardware.

extraproject.name: Kernels
extraproject.p: The development of kernels related to SPARC and ultraSPARC processors to ensure maximum compatibility and performance on each processor line
